### Install Dependencies

- [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/)
  - `/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)"`
- [Node](https://nodejs.org/en/)
  - `brew install node`

### Install Packages

```sh
npm install
```

### Start Developing

```sh
cd francistogram/
gatsby develop
```

View the blog on http://localhost:8000/

### Deploy

Deploys are automatically handled by [Netlify](http://netlify.com/) when a commit is pushed to master
